venue.address_1: 100 Milk Street Entrance (Ten PO Sq Bldg)
venue.name: Exemplar Law Partners, LLC

item.description:
Hello Fellow Entreprenuers,

Join us for a Holiday networking event for professionals, entrepreneurs and business owners! Meet some of the other 275 members of the Entrepreneurs Group and celebrate the first year of the Boston Entrepreneurs Network! Pizza, soda, wine and snacks provided! (Due to security in the building, you must have your name on our RSVP list to attend, so please remember to RSVP)

WHEN: Tuesday, December 12th from 6:30-8:30pm

WHERE: Exemplar Law Partners (NEW OFFICES)
Ten Post Office Square
8th Floor
Boston, MA 02109
617-542-7400

WHY: Networking, Food, Fun, Holiday Spirit!

RSVP NOW! (Space is limited to 50 for each event!)

Food and Drinks provided by Exemplar Law Partners, LLC


Questions? email cmarston@exemplarlaw.com OR 617-542-7400


I will look forward to seeing you then!

Christopher Marston, Esq.
Exemplar Law Partners, LLC
item.name: Holiday Networking Event #1! TUE, DEC 12th 6:30-8:30pm
